author: xtqqczze
body:
`markdownlint` tests were removed in #10163 due to a security issue in a dependancy ([CVE-2019-10746](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-MIXINDEEP-450212)).

According to [snyk](https://snyk.io/test/npm/markdownlint/), `markdownlint` has no currently known vulnerabilities, so we should restore these tests.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: spelling check doesn't work unless markdown is correctly formatted.  I agree wit the proposal.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #12549, which has now been successfully released as `v7.1.0-preview.4`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.1.0-preview.4)

title: Restore markdownlint tests
